data.title: Gillette Stadium
data.meta_description: Official website of the MBTA -- schedules, maps, and fare information for Greater Boston's public transportation system, including subway, commuter rail, bus routes, and boat lines.
data.text:
Whether you’re headed to Gillette Stadium for a Patriots game, concert, or other event, you can take the MBTA to avoid traffic. You’ll arrive at Foxboro station, which is about a quarter of a mile from Gillette.

There are two ways to access Gillette:

Take the Franklin/Foxboro Line to Foxboro station

Take an event train to Foxboro station

Take the Franklin/Foxboro Line

The Franklin/Foxboro Line is a regular Commuter Rail service that isn’t timed to events at Gillette and has more stops on the way to Foxboro. Tickets are available through the mTicket app and fare vending machines.

What to Know Ahead of Time

For the Franklin/Foxboro Line, one-way tickets from South Station to Foxboro station are $8.75. You can purchase tickets through the mTicket app or at a fare vending machine.

The $10 Commuter Rail Weekend Pass and Commuter Rail Monthly Pass are both valid on the Franklin/Foxboro Line.

The last Franklin/Foxboro Line train may depart from Foxboro station before your event ends. Check the Franklin/Foxboro Line schedule for more information about stops and departure times.

Learn more about Commuter Rail fares

Take an Event Train

Event trains are scheduled based on the start and end times of select events at Gillette. Tickets are limited and only available through the mTicket app.

What to Know Ahead of Time

If there’s an event train offered for your event, we highly recommend that you buy tickets before the day of the event because tickets can sell out. If they do, you can consider taking the Franklin/Foxboro Line.

Round trip tickets for Patriot games to Foxboro are $10. Round trip tickets for concerts to Foxboro are $20. Event trains leave from South Station in Boston and, for select events, Providence station in Rhode Island.

All event train tickets are round trip. Train schedules are based on the start and end time of your event at Gillette.

Tickets for event trains are only available on the mTicket app. Once you’ve purchased your ticket, you can access it through the app. Please note, event train tickets cannot be refunded or exchanged.

When to Buy Tickets

Where to Buy Tickets

When you're ready to purchase your tickets, download the mTicket app. Credit and debit cards are accepted.

Download on the App Store Get it on Google Play

What to Know on the Day of the Event

Only activate your ticket when you’re ready to board. For your round-trip ticket, you receive two ticket activations in the mTicket app. Make sure to activate your ticket once just before boarding the train to Gillette Stadium on the day of the event, and then again just before boarding the train after your event.

The departure times for your train will be listed on the Foxboro schedule the day of the event.

Trains usually arrive an hour before the event begins and depart 30 minutes after the event ends. Boston trains stop at South Station, Back Bay, and Dedham Corporate Center. Providence trains stop at Providence, Pawtucket/Central Falls, Attleboro, and Mansfield. You can board the train at any stop, regardless of the origin station on your ticket.

Round trip tickets will be available on mTicket starting August 1 at 11 AM.

Schedule from Boston:

Depart South Station: 4:15 PM

Depart Back Bay: 4:20 PM

Depart Dedham Corporate Center: 4:35 PM

Arrive Foxboro: 5:15 PM

There will be no train to or from Providence for this game.

After the game: Trains depart Foxboro 30 minutes after the game ends.

Check the Foxboro schedule for live departures times the day of the game.

Round trip tickets will be available on mTicket starting August 9 at 11 AM.

Round trip tickets will be available on mTicket starting September 9 at 11 AM.

Concerts

Trains are scheduled for select upcoming concerts at Gillette Stadium. Round trip tickets for concerts to Foxboro are $20.

Note: Event train tickets for the Zach Bryan concert dates will go on sale separately, two weeks before each concert. Check below for details.

There will be one train with service between Boston and Foxboro for this event.

Round-trip tickets will be available on mTicket starting July 19 at 11 AM.

Schedule from Boston:

Depart South Station: 3:45 PM

Depart Back Bay: 3:50 PM

Depart Dedham Corporate Center: 4:05 PM

Arrive at Foxboro: 4:45 PM

After the concert: Trains depart Foxboro 30 minutes after the concert ends.

Check the Foxboro schedule for live departure times the day of the concert.

Round-trip tickets will be available on mTicket starting July 19 at 11 AM.

Schedule from Boston:

Depart South Station: 3:30 PM

Depart Back Bay: 3:35 PM

Depart Dedham Corporate Center: 3:50 PM

Arrive Foxboro: 4:35 PM

Schedule from Providence:

Depart Providence: 3:35 PM

Depart Pawtucket/Central Falls: 3:41 PM

Depart Attleboro: 3:55 PM

Depart Mansfield: 4:05 PM

Arrive Foxboro: 4:50 PM

After the concert: Trains depart Foxboro 30 minutes after the concert ends.

Check the Foxboro schedule for live departure times the day of the concert.

There will be one train with service between Boston and Foxboro for this event.

Round-trip tickets will be available on mTicket starting August 7 at 11 AM.

Arrive at Foxboro: 5:15 PM

New England Revolution Games

Trains run from South Station to Gillette Stadium for New England Revolution home games.

Paying for your fare:

There will be a train from Boston and a train from Providence. Round trip match tickets are $10 and are available exclusively through the mTicket app, available for Android and Apple users. Tickets go on sale on April 17th at 11 AM. Due to the anticipated high attendance at this event, no returns or exchanges are available. Tickets sales will end once maximum capacity is reached.

Schedule from Boston:

Depart South Station: 5:25 PM

Depart Back Bay: 5:30 PM

Depart Dedham Corporate Center: 5:50 PM

Arrive Foxboro: 6:25 PM

Schedule from Providence:

Depart Providence: 5:20 PM

Depart Pawtucket/Central Falls: 5:26

Depart Attleboro: 5:40 PM

Depart Mansfield: 5:50 PM

Arrive Foxboro: 6:30 PM

After the game: Trains depart Foxboro 30 minutes after the match ends.

Check the Foxboro schedule for live departures times the day of the concert.

Other Events

Trains run from South Station to Gillette Stadium for select events.

There will be one train with service between Boston and Foxboro for this event.

Round-trip tickets are $20 and will be available on mTicket starting May 6 at 11 AM.

Schedule from Boston:

Depart South Station: 4:15 PM

Depart Back Bay: 4:20 PM

Depart Dedham Corporate Center: 4:35 PM

Arrive at Foxboro: 5:15 PM

After the ceremony: Trains depart Foxboro 30 minutes after the ceremony ends.

Rules and Etiquette on Trains

Anything that is prohibited at Gillette Stadium is also prohibited on trains, including large, non-clear bags that don't comply with the stadium's Clear Bag Policy. Alcohol is prohibited on the Commuter Rail. Any personal items left on trains during events will be discarded.

Learn more at the official Gillette Stadium page
